content: 3-10 repeat row 2 a total of 8 times or until you use up most of your first 20 g mini skein row 11 using contrasting color yarn and while weaving in previous color as you crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in blo of first st double_crochet in blo of ea of the next 17 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in blo of ea of the next 17 sts 2 double_crochet in blo of last st turn row 12 repeat last row row 13 chain 2 2 double_crochet in blo of first st *double_crochet in blo of ea of the next 4 sts work bobble in blo of next st repeat from * 3 times total 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts skip 2 sts double_crochet in blo of the next 2 sts **work bobble in blo of next st double_crochet in blo of next 4 sts repeat from ** 3 times total 2 double_crochet in blo of last st turn row 14-22 using next 20g mini skein/color 2 repeat row 2 a total of 10 times or until you almost run out of your second 20g mini skein row 23-25 using contrasting color yarn repeat row 11-13 cont in this manner changing colors as needed until you use all 12 of your mini skeins or your scarf is to your desired length 4 copyright 2023 the autumn acorn pattern is intended for personal use only all uses are strictly prohibited all rights reserved + finishing blocking _______________________ ____________________ soak your scarf in warm water + mild soap for at least one hour and then wrap it in a towel to remove excess water do not let the wet scarf hang unsupported reshape and lay flat to dry weave in all loose ends and enjoy 5 copyright 2023 the autumn acorn pattern is intended for personal use only all uses are strictly prohibited all rights reserved where to find me _____________________________ _________________________ a huge thank you to everyone who has helped make these patterns possible i
